scene_description_enriched: A bearded man, wearing a turban and a golden robe with a blue mantle, is depicted in profile, kneeling or seated. He holds a scroll in his left hand and points with his right index finger towards a celestial vision. The vision, depicted in the upper right corner, shows two figures, possibly an angel and a woman, within a radiant, cloud-like form. The background features a green landscape with trees and fields, suggesting an outdoor setting. The overall scene likely represents a prophetic vision or divine revelation.
